name: Incandescence (itch)
description:
Strange beasts try to extinguish your light as you traverse a snowy world.

- created in 72 hours for the merry corgsmas game jam -

keyboard and mouse-

WASD - move

Left Click - bark to frighten the beasts (you can't bark with a lantern in your mouth, silly dog)

Right Click - pick up or set down your lantern (the beasts will always go toward the lantern, they have no hunger for dog's flesh)

controller-

Left Analog Stick - move

A - bark to frighten the beasts (you can't bark with a lantern in your mouth, silly dog)

B - pick up or set down your lantern (the beasts will always go toward the lantern, they have no hunger for dog's flesh)

music-

Frédéric Chopin's Ballade no.1 used under the public domain licence
